jacdac.AccelerometerEvent.FaceDown: Emitted when accelerometer is laying flat in the given direction.
jacdac.AccelerometerEvent.FaceUp: Emitted when accelerometer is laying flat in the given direction.
jacdac.AccelerometerEvent.Force2g: Emitted when force in any direction exceeds given threshold.
jacdac.AccelerometerEvent.Force3g: Emitted when force in any direction exceeds given threshold.
jacdac.AccelerometerEvent.Force6g: Emitted when force in any direction exceeds given threshold.
jacdac.AccelerometerEvent.Force8g: Emitted when force in any direction exceeds given threshold.
jacdac.AccelerometerEvent.Freefall: Emitted when total force acting on accelerometer is much less than 1g.
jacdac.AccelerometerEvent.Shake: Emitted when forces change violently a few times.
jacdac.AccelerometerEvent.TiltDown: Emitted when accelerometer is tilted in the given direction.
jacdac.AccelerometerEvent.TiltLeft: Emitted when accelerometer is tilted in the given direction.
jacdac.AccelerometerEvent.TiltRight: Emitted when accelerometer is tilted in the given direction.
jacdac.AccelerometerEvent.TiltUp: Emitted when accelerometer is tilted in the given direction.
jacdac.AccelerometerReg.Forces:
Indicates the current forces acting on accelerometer.
* ```
const [x, y, z] = jdunpack<[number, number, number]>(buf, "i12.20 i12.20 i12.20")
```
jacdac.AccelerometerReg.ForcesError:
Read-only g u12.20 (uint32_t). Error on the reading value.
* ```
const [forcesError] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u12.20")
```
jacdac.AccelerometerReg.MaxForce:
Read-write g u12.20 (uint32_t). Configures the range forces detected.
The value will be "rounded up" to one of `max_forces_supported`.
* ```
const [maxForce] = jdunpack<[number]>(buf, "u12.20")
```
jacdac.AccelerometerReg.MaxForcesSupport:
Constant. Lists values supported for writing `max_force`.
* ```
const [maxForce] = jdunpack<[number[]]>(buf, "u12.20[]")
```
modules.AccelerometerClient.maxForce:
Configures the range forces detected.
The value will be "rounded up" to one of `max_forces_supported`.

modules.AccelerometerClient.onTiltRight: Emitted when accelerometer is tilted in the given direction.

Configures the range forces detected.
